document_data.name: Milosh
document_data.mainbody: '''Milosh the Impartial''' was a merchant who lived in [[Helm's Hold]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He sold a variety of goods useful to adventurers such healing kits that could help mend injuries, or those that helped them better understand magic, religion or the natural world. Milosh even sold items that aided in the art of thievery or helped uncover secrets found within ruined dungeons.
document_data.History: During the [[Siege of Helm's Hold]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Milosh became stuck outside the city's main entrance alongside several other prominent citizens, including [[Rannigan|Investigator Rannigan]] and the [[Helmite]] priest, [[Satarin|Brother Satarin]].
